entries.meaning:
(geometry) A quartic plane curve whose equation in Cartesian coordinates is 
  
    
      
        (
        
          x
          
            2
          
        
        +
        
          y
          
            2
          
        
        
          )
          
            2
          
        
        =
        a
        
          x
          
            2
          
        
        y
      
    
    {\displaystyle (x^{2}+y^{2})^{2}=ax^{2}y}
  
.
